verses.name: Genesis 36:17
verses.text: And these are the sons of Reuel Esau’s son; duke Nahath, duke Zerah, duke Shammah, duke Mizzah: these are the dukes that came of Reuel in the land of Edom; these are the sons of Bashemath Esau’s wife.

verses.name: Genesis 36:18
verses.text: And these are the sons of Aholibamah Esau’s wife; duke Jeush, duke Jaalam, duke Korah: these were the dukes that came of Aholibamah the daughter of Anah, Esau’s wife.

verses.name: Genesis 36:19
verses.text: These are the sons of Esau, who is Edom, and these are their dukes.

verses.name: Genesis 36:20
verses.text: These are the sons of Seir the Horite, who inhabited the land; Lotan, and Shobal, and Zibeon, and Anah,
